meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the December 4, 2024 City Council Meeting
Consideration of appointments to boards and commissions
agenda_items.description: Evaluation and duties of board and commission members (List of nominees is available in the City Secretary's Office)

agenda_items.title: Attorney Briefings
agenda_items.description: Seeking the advice of the City Attorney regarding: Janie Cisneros v. The City of Dallas, et. al., DC-23-21102.

agenda_items.title: Real Estate
agenda_items.description: (1) Deliberate the purchase, exchange, lease, or value of real property, the Bullington Truck Terminal, generally located underground at 1627 Pacific Avenue.

agenda_items.title: Personnel
agenda_items.description: Interview candidates for the city manager position as recommended by the Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs.
